title: Episode 241: The Death Tax for the Rest of Us
itunes:title: Episode 241: The Death Tax for the Rest of Us
description:
As politicians run out of revenue sources, they increasingly turn their attention from the rich to the middle class. Congress is considering a tax plan that effectively imposes a death tax on the middle class. Interestingly, politicians are calling it "a capital gains tax."
